long_description: Ultralight, durable and compressible, the men's Arc'teryx Squamish Hoody Jacket offers very tough wind-resistant fabric for lightweight warmth when the temperature begins to drop. The men's Arc'teryx Squamish Hoody Jacket features ultralight minimalist construction and stows in the chest pocket for maximum packability. Resilient ripstop nylon offers mechanical stretch and a durable water repellent finish. Helmet-compatible StormHood(TM) can be cinched with 1-handed drawcords; provides ergonomic freedom and allows for improved vision. Weighs 5.5 oz.; articulated elbows; wind flap; adjustable hem cord; rip-and-stick cuffs.
short_description: Ultralight, durable and compressible, the men's Arc'teryx Squamish Hoody Jacket offers very tough wind-resistant fabric for lightweight warmth when the temperature begins to drop.
